name: Divanee
tag_list: south-asian, media, wedding, deals, discounts, india
overview:
The Divanee South Asian Media Network is a network of sites targeted towards South Asian women.

The Divanee South Asian Media Network is multi-platform (websites, blogs, mobile apps, ipad app coming soon).

The Divanee South Asian Media Network consists of:

Divanee Lifestyle - South Asian entertainment and media news in the US

Divanee Wedding - A one-stop-shop for all your South Asian wedding planning needs for vendors, brides, grooms, and family. Vendors can create their own Storefronts on Divanee Wedding. Divanee Wedding has over 700 rated and reviewed vendors.

DivaDeals - is your resource for getting unbeatable food, health and beauty deals delivered to your inbox every week from all South Asian inspired things!
